title: Vampirella Valentine's Day Special 2022
description: Mardi Gras may still be a couple weeks away, but that doesn't mean spirits aren't stirring! Valentine's Day is New Orlean's version of Halloween-the one day a year that's a supernatural free-for-all, when all the ghosts and ghoulies come out to feast on the spirits and flesh of horny tourists. Let's just say there's going to be big trouble in the Big Easy!
author: David Avallone
